Html:
This might be a really stupid question, but is there any way to change the auto compilation of typescript in visual studio to the AMD module type? At command line, it's as easy as adding "--module amd", but I can't seem to find a configuration in Visual Studio for the typescript compiler.

Thanks,
Andrew Gaspar

I don't know about stock VS, but with the Web Essentials extension you can. Plus, it offers a TON of other nice features. I would recommend it.

http://visualstudiogallery.msdn.microsoft.com/07d54d12-7133-4e15-becb-6f451ea3bea6

Awesome! Thanks!

Andrew Gaspar

P.S. Whoever the stock extension developers are should add that as an option. Or make the extension open source so I can add it. ;)
